channel.title: Colophon on d00k
channel.description: Recent content in Colophon on d00k

item.title: What is d00k.net?
item.description: Created in 2021, d00k.net has been my home on the internet for over 3 years now. It’s function and purpose has evolved during this time, ultimately coming to it’s current state today. It’s original purpose was to help understand myself better by placing all the knowledge I knew and all the art I created in one spot, and it still retains this purpose today. However, it has also evolved along with my own design practices to represent my standings on how unsustainable the technology industry is and how it forces us to consume at obscene rates.

item.title: Identity
item.description: A guide to the various visual aspects of this site and the presentation of Dook as an identity. Personal Flag The flag, which features as the favicon for d00k.net, serves as a cartographic representation of my aesthetic and philosophies. The design and colourscheme were chosen for their visual synergy, rather than having any distinct meaning. Pieces The central core to the visual identity of d00k.net, Pieces serve as an abstract yvess method of communication to the viewer.
